sentences.english: After having made arrangements for his master， Monkey left for the Plantain Cave to see Princess Iron Fan.
sentences.chinese: 司空把師父安排好，前往芭蕉洞找鐵扇公主。

sentences.english: That year, the easy man thrown, red cherry, green banana.
sentences.chinese: 那一年，流光容易把人拋，紅了櫻桃，綠了芭蕉。

sentences.english: Often he slept in Buddhist temples where monks gave him food and shelter for the night.
sentences.chinese: 芭蕉常常睡在寺廟，寺裏的和尚給他提供食宿。

sentences.english: You into the water, like little hit the banana?
sentences.chinese: 你化成滴水，是否想點點的打在芭蕉上？

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo study effective constituents of Musa basjoo Sieb. et Zucc.
sentences.chinese: 目的對芭蕉根有效成分進行初步研究。

sentences.english: For years, Issa's stepfamily refused to share the old farmhouse.
sentences.chinese: 芭蕉的繼母家多年來拒絕和他共住老屋。

sentences.english: After having made arrangements for his master, Monkey left for the Plantain Cave to see Princess Iron Fan.
sentences.chinese: 悟空把師父安排好，前往芭蕉洞找鐵扇公主。

sentences.english: Addu atoll is almost completely covered with banana trees and bushes in bloom.
sentences.chinese: 阿杜環礁是幾乎完全覆蓋着芭蕉樹和盛開的灌木叢。

sentences.english: Red cherry, green banana, the old man cast time.
sentences.chinese: 紅了櫻桃綠了芭蕉，時光總把舊人拋。

sentences.english: Plantains are starchy types that are cooked before eating.
sentences.chinese: 芭蕉是刻板類型都必須煮熟後才進食。

sentences.english: Issa stayed by his father's bedside and nursed him during his final months. Then his father made one request.
sentences.chinese: 在父親的最後幾個月裏，芭蕉留在病牀邊照料他。

sentences.english: By the time Issa was seven, his father had remarried, and it was time for Issa to go to the village school.
sentences.chinese: 芭蕉七歲前，也就是他上村孰啓蒙時，父親再婚了。

sentences.english: It makes a lovely picture, the bamboo houses set off by green plantain trees.
sentences.chinese: 它使一個可愛的圖片，竹房屋抵銷的綠色芭蕉樹。

sentences.english: Bananas, including plantains, fresh or dried.
sentences.chinese: 鮮或乾的香蕉，包括芭蕉。

sentences.english: With the plantain fan, Monkey put out the fire.
sentences.chinese: 用芭蕉扇扇，猴撲滅了火。

sentences.english: On a summer evening grandpa will go out for a walk waving a palm leaf fan.
sentences.chinese: 晚上，爺爺喫完飯就搖着芭蕉扇出門了。

definition: Kaoshu township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
yellow flowers (of various types)/chrysanthemum/cauliflower/(yellow) daylily/a young virgin (boy or girl)
autumn frost/fig. white hair as sign of old age
